channel.description:
[/center] [/center] [center][b]Welcome To PK Tavern[/b][/center] [center][url=http://tavernpking.createaforum.com/]Official Website[/url] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/home/Public?select=Client.jar]Client Download[/url] [url=http://tavernpking.createaforum.com/index.php?action=ezportal;sa=page;p=2]Play Now[/url][/center]
[center][b]-Features-[/b] Better combat system Player Attack & Follow clipping Most Exploits fixed Cheat Client Patched Hyperion Core New hp bars/fading/x10 toggle Clan chats 100% Mage bank + Near by areas features coded. 100% Switching Auth code vote system Vote point shop & Pk Point shop All Pking spots in mage book teleport. quest tab pk information. Titles Correct food & Pot delay Everything needed for a pk server. Amazing features added to pking to make the experience funner[/center] [center] [img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/tavern/random.png[/img] [img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/tavern/agsspec.png[/img] [center][img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/tavern/Dclaws.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/tavern/shop.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/qt.png[/img] [img]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/mflash106/qt2.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=8pt]100% Credits to Complexity & Elevationrsps for a great source[/size][/center]
